projects.name: Face Destortion Filter
projects.description: Contributed a unique face distortion filter to the Instagram community through creation with Meta Spark Studio.

projects.name: Healthiness
projects.description: Create a simulated environment where AI algorithms can interact with the data. Implement and train AI models for various healthcare applications. This could include disease diagnosis, treatment recommendations, patient monitoring, and more.

projects.name: Handwritten digit recognition using MNIST dataset
projects.description: Handwritten digit recognition using the MNIST dataset involves training a model to classify images of handwritten digits from 0 to 9, typically using deep learning techniques like Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs). The MNIST dataset contains 70,000 grayscale images of handwritten digits from 0 to 9, with 60,000 images in the training set and 10,000 images in the test set. Each image is a 28x28 pixel square.

projects.name: Streamlining of Judicial cases
projects.description: Streamlining judicial cases through Digital Case Management (DCM) systems involves leveraging technology to improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the judicial process. By implementing Digital Case Management systems, the judicial process becomes more efficient, transparent, and accessible, ultimately serving the goal of delivering justice more effectively and swiftly.

projects.name: Implemented wireless data indexing for efficient broadcasting.
projects.description: Developed and implemented an optimized XML data processing module using binary tree representation and preorder traversal, resulting in enhanced efficiency and speed in data retrieval. Collaborated with team members to devise and refine a novel indexing technique tailored for wireless environments, significantly improving XML data access over multiple channels.

experiences.description: Associate with AR/VR specialist with a dedicated pursuit of mastery in cutting-edge technologies. Attended technocrat-organized bootcamps, honing skills in cutting-edge AR/VR technologies.
Collaborated seamlessly with a diverse hackathon team, contributing ideas and skills to collectively tackle challenges and deliver impactful solutions.
